attributes.action: Bring Drama as a subject to the national curriculum for Primary Schools
attributes.additional_details: Not only is Drama fun, it also helps children understand the world around them, nurtures friendships, develops communication skills and most importantly develops creativity. This is why we are passionate about the cause and believe Drama is essential for the National Curriculum in Primary Schools. So, ACT NOW and help us emphasize the 'importance of the stage from a young age.'
attributes.background: We are a group of teenagers who strongly believe that creativity is everything. We believe that Drama is the way forward for children. ACT NOW is a campaign, which encourages Drama to be put onto the National Curriculum for Primary Schools in order to help with the development of each child.
